DRS.CHIP.CHANNEL_CONFIG.name: DRS.CHIP.CHANNEL_CONFIG
DRS.CHIP.CHANNEL_CONFIG.description: Write Shift Register Configuration                             \\ # of chn - # of cells per ch - bit pattern                             \\ 8        - 1024              - 11111111b                             \\ 4        - 2048              - 01010101b                             \\ 2        - 4096              - 00010001b                             \\ 1        - 8192              - 00000001b

DRS.CHIP.DTAP_FREQ.name: DRS.CHIP.DTAP_FREQ
DRS.CHIP.DTAP_FREQ.description: Frequency of DTAP in units of 100Hz

DRS.CHIP.CLK_IDELAY.name: DRS.CHIP.CLK_IDELAY
DRS.CHIP.CLK_IDELAY.description: DRS CLK IDELAY Setting 0-31 in 78 ps increments

DRS.READOUT.ROI_MODE.name: DRS.READOUT.ROI_MODE
DRS.READOUT.ROI_MODE.description: Set to 1 to enable Region of Interest Readout

DRS.READOUT.ADC_LATENCY.name: DRS.READOUT.ADC_LATENCY
DRS.READOUT.ADC_LATENCY.description: Latency from first sr clock to when ADC data should be valid

DRS.READOUT.SAMPLE_COUNT.name: DRS.READOUT.SAMPLE_COUNT
DRS.READOUT.SAMPLE_COUNT.description: Number of samples to read out (0 to 1023)

DRS.READOUT.READOUT_MASK.name: DRS.READOUT.READOUT_MASK
DRS.READOUT.READOUT_MASK.description: 8 bit mask, set a bit to 1 to enable readout of that channel. 9th is auto-read if any channel is enabled *and* AUTO_9TH_CHANNEL set to 1

DRS.READOUT.AUTO_9TH_CHANNEL.name: DRS.READOUT.AUTO_9TH_CHANNEL
DRS.READOUT.AUTO_9TH_CHANNEL.description: Set to 1 to auto read the 9th channel

DRS.READOUT.START.name: DRS.READOUT.START
DRS.READOUT.START.description: Write 1 to take the state machine out of idle mode

DRS.READOUT.REINIT.name: DRS.READOUT.REINIT
DRS.READOUT.REINIT.description: Write 1 to reinitialize DRS state machine (restores to idle state)

DRS.READOUT.CONFIGURE.name: DRS.READOUT.CONFIGURE
DRS.READOUT.CONFIGURE.description: Write 1 to configure the DRS. Should be done before data taking

DRS.READOUT.DRS_RESET.name: DRS.READOUT.DRS_RESET
DRS.READOUT.DRS_RESET.description: Write 1 to completely reset the DRS state machine logic

DRS.READOUT.DAQ_RESET.name: DRS.READOUT.DAQ_RESET
DRS.READOUT.DAQ_RESET.description: Write 1 to completely reset the DAQ state machine logic

DRS.READOUT.DMA_RESET.name: DRS.READOUT.DMA_RESET
DRS.READOUT.DMA_RESET.description: Write 1 to completely reset the DMA state machine logic

DRS.READOUT.WAIT_VDD_CLKS.name: DRS.READOUT.WAIT_VDD_CLKS
DRS.READOUT.WAIT_VDD_CLKS.description: Number of ADC clocks to wait before reading out the drs, allowing vdd to stabilize; default=0x14d=10us

DRS.READOUT.DRS_DIAGNOSTIC_MODE.name: DRS.READOUT.DRS_DIAGNOSTIC_MODE
DRS.READOUT.DRS_DIAGNOSTIC_MODE.description: 1 will make the DRS read out the cell ID instead of ADC data

DRS.READOUT.POSNEG.name: DRS.READOUT.POSNEG
DRS.READOUT.POSNEG.description: 1 to sample on positive edge, 0 on negative

DRS.READOUT.DMA_CLEAR.name: DRS.READOUT.DMA_CLEAR
DRS.READOUT.DMA_CLEAR.description: Write 1 to clear the DMA memory (write zeroes)

DRS.FPGA.DRS_TEMP.name: DRS.FPGA.DRS_TEMP
DRS.FPGA.DRS_TEMP.description: Copy of the I2C DRS temperature reading

DRS.DAQ.INJECT_DEBUG_PACKET.name: DRS.DAQ.INJECT_DEBUG_PACKET
DRS.DAQ.INJECT_DEBUG_PACKET.description: Injects a fixed format debug packet into the DAQ

DRS.DAQ.DAQ_FRAGMENT_EN.name: DRS.DAQ.DAQ_FRAGMENT_EN
DRS.DAQ.DAQ_FRAGMENT_EN.description: 1 to enable daq fragments (header only packets) when the DRS is busy

DRS.DAQ.DAQ_BUSY.name: DRS.DAQ.DAQ_BUSY
DRS.DAQ.DAQ_BUSY.description: 1 = DAQ is still busy reading out

DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_EN.name: DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_EN
DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_EN.description: Set to 1 to enable the external trigger

DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_ACTIVE_HI.name: DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_ACTIVE_HI
DRS.TRIGGER.EXT_TRIGGER_ACTIVE_HI.description: Set to 1 for active high external trigger

DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_IS_LEVEL.name: DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_IS_LEVEL
DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_IS_LEVEL.description: Set to 1 for mt level trigger on v2.4 boards

DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_DELAY.name: DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_DELAY
DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_DELAY.description: Trigger delay measured in LUT1 units

DRS.TRIGGER.CNT_MT_PRBS_ERRS.name: DRS.TRIGGER.CNT_MT_PRBS_ERRS
DRS.TRIGGER.CNT_MT_PRBS_ERRS.description: Number of PRBS errors on the MT line

DRS.TRIGGER.MT_PRBS_ERR_RESET.name: DRS.TRIGGER.MT_PRBS_ERR_RESET
DRS.TRIGGER.MT_PRBS_ERR_RESET.description: Write 1 to reset the MT PRBS Error Counter

DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_MODE.name: DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_MODE
DRS.TRIGGER.MT_TRIGGER_MODE.description: 1 to use the MT as the source of the trigger

DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_ENABLE.name: DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_ENABLE
DRS.TRIGGER.TRIGGER_ENABLE.description: Set to 0 to stop all triggers. 1 to enable triggers.

DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_CORRECTION.name: DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_CORRECTION
DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_CORRECTION.description: Number of Single Event Errors corrected by the scrubber

DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_UNCORRECTABLE.name: DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_UNCORRECTABLE
DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_SEM_UNCORRECTABLE.description: Number of Critical Single Event Errors (uncorrectable by scrubber)

DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_READOUTS_COMPLETED.name: DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_READOUTS_COMPLETED
DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_READOUTS_COMPLETED.description: Number of readouts completed since reset

DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_DMA_READOUTS_COMPLETED.name: DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_DMA_READOUTS_COMPLETED
DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_DMA_READOUTS_COMPLETED.description: Number of readouts completed since reset

DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_LOST_EVENT.name: DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_LOST_EVENT
DRS.COUNTERS.CNT_LOST_EVENT.description: Number of trigger lost due to deadtime

DRS.COUNTERS.LOST_TRIGGER_RATE.name: DRS.COUNTERS.LOST_TRIGGER_RATE
DRS.COUNTERS.LOST_TRIGGER_RATE.description: Rate of lost triggers in Hz

DRS.TRIG_GEN_RATE.name: DRS.TRIG_GEN_RATE
DRS.TRIG_GEN_RATE.description: Rate of generated triggers f_trig = (1/clk_period) * rate/0xffffffff

DRS.DMA.RAM_A_OCC_RST.name: DRS.DMA.RAM_A_OCC_RST
DRS.DMA.RAM_A_OCC_RST.description: Sets RAM buffer a counter to 0

DRS.DMA.RAM_B_OCC_RST.name: DRS.DMA.RAM_B_OCC_RST
DRS.DMA.RAM_B_OCC_RST.description: Sets RAM buffer b counter to 0

DRS.DMA.TOGGLE_RAM.name: DRS.DMA.TOGGLE_RAM
DRS.DMA.TOGGLE_RAM.description: Write 1 to switch the dma buffer to the other half

DRS.GFP.EVENTID_SPI_EN.name: DRS.GFP.EVENTID_SPI_EN
DRS.GFP.EVENTID_SPI_EN.description: 1 to enable GFP Event ID from SPI

DRS.GFP.EVENTID_RX.name: DRS.GFP.EVENTID_RX
DRS.GFP.EVENTID_RX.description: Event ID from GFP SPI Interface

DRS.GFP.EVENTID_TIMEOUT_CNT.name: DRS.GFP.EVENTID_TIMEOUT_CNT
DRS.GFP.EVENTID_TIMEOUT_CNT.description: Timed out triggers waiting for event id
